English: different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end

d.f: `比喻~`採取~`的~`方法~`雖~`不同~，`所得~`的~`結果~`卻~`相同~。`參見~「`同歸殊途~」`條~。

English: different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
francais: Tous les chemins mènent à Rome.
